Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 69th/Paulina
ShortDescription: WB 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Ashland, 67th, Damen, and 69th over normal route, due to a police activity near 69th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Ashland, 67th, Damen, and 69th over normal route, due to a police activity near 69th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.
